entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
